FuncDef: The reset dhcp relay statistics command clears message statistics on a DHCP relay agent. The reset dhcp relay statistics command clears message statistics on a DHCP relay agent.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a DHCP server group.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters. It can contain only digits, letters, and special characters ('_', '-', and '.') and cannot use "-" or "--" as a name. If the string is enclosed in double quotation marks ("), spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo: This command is applicable to DHCP relay agents. Collecting statistics on the DHCP messages sent and received within a specified period helps you locate DHCP faults. Run the reset dhcp relay statistics command to clear original statistics on DHCP messages, and run the display dhcp relay statistics command to view packet statistics about the DHCP relay agent.
